name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Kobo Kanaeru introduces her next solo performance.

subtitles.original: あー、たくさんのゲストとパフォーマンスしてから、
subtitles.english: Ah, after performing with so many guests,

subtitles.original: 次はコボはまた一人で歌いたいなと思います！
subtitles.english: next, Kobo wants to sing alone again!

subtitles.original: これから歌うこの曲は、最近コボが気に入ってる曲で、
subtitles.english: The song I'm about to sing is one Kobo's liked lately,

subtitles.original: 聞いたら幸せな気持ちなりました。
subtitles.english: and it made me feel happy when I heard it.

subtitles.original: 皆さんも、この曲聞いて幸せを感じてくれたら嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you all feel happiness listening to this song too.

subtitles.original: それでは次の曲、青山テルマさんの「Happiness」です！
subtitles.english: Well then, here is the next song, "Happiness" by Teruma Aoyama!

subtitles.original: 君とHappiness 君がいれば
subtitles.english: Happiness with you, if you're there

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だって思えるよ
subtitles.english: I feel like everything will be alright

subtitles.original: 何も言わなくたって
subtitles.english: Even without saying a word

subtitles.original: 感じてるよ the one for me
subtitles.english: I'm feeling it, the one for me

subtitles.original:
Happiness
Lyrics: 青山テルマ、H.U.B. / Music: 坂詰美紗子
subtitles.english:
Happiness
Lyrics: Thelma Aoyama, H.U.B. / Music: Misako Sakazume

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで眠れなくて
subtitles.english: Feeling down and unable to sleep

subtitles.original: 君との写真見つめている
subtitles.english: I'm staring at photos of you

subtitles.original: いくつもの笑顔たちに
subtitles.english: By so many smiles

subtitles.original: 助けられるよ my life
subtitles.english: I'm being saved, my life

subtitles.original: ずっと一緒だよ
subtitles.english: We'll always be together

subtitles.original: 泣いてもいいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry

subtitles.original: あの涙を抱きしめてくれた
subtitles.english: You embraced those tears

subtitles.original: どこにいるの？
subtitles.english: Where are you?

subtitles.original: ここにいるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm here

subtitles.original: すぐに会いたいぜ！
subtitles.english: I want to see you right now!

subtitles.original: 君とHappiness 君がいれば
subtitles.english: Happiness with you, if you're there

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だって思えるよ
subtitles.english: I feel like everything will be alright

subtitles.original: 何も言わなくたって
subtitles.english: Even without saying a word

subtitles.original: 感じてるよ the one for me
subtitles.english: I'm feeling it, the one for me

subtitles.original: 君とHappiness どんな時も
subtitles.english: Happiness with you, no matter when

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないって信じてるよ
subtitles.english: I believe I'm not alone

subtitles.original: 涙あふれたって
subtitles.english: Even if tears overflow

subtitles.original: 歩けるね please stay by my side
subtitles.english: I can walk, please stay by my side

subtitles.original: 君に出会えてからは
subtitles.english: Since I met you

subtitles.original: 素直に笑っていられるよ
subtitles.english: I've been able to smile honestly

subtitles.original: 少しずつ自分のこと
subtitles.english: Little by little, about myself

subtitles.original: 好きになった for your love
subtitles.english: I've come to like myself for your love

subtitles.original: そう今ならね心から
subtitles.english: Yes, now from the bottom of my heart

subtitles.original: 分かり合えるって思えるよ
subtitles.english: I feel like we can understand each other

subtitles.original: 強がらずにありのままで
subtitles.english: Without acting tough, just as I am

subtitles.original: 見つめてくれた
subtitles.english: You looked at me

subtitles.original: だからHappiness 君のことを
subtitles.english: Therefore Happiness, about you

subtitles.original: 今よりももっと知りたくて
subtitles.english: I want to know you more than now

subtitles.original: どんな言葉よりも
subtitles.english: More than any words

subtitles.original: 大切なよ the one for me
subtitles.english: You're precious, the one for me

subtitles.original: 私も君に何か
subtitles.english: I also want to

subtitles.original: できることしたいよ
subtitles.english: do something for you

subtitles.original: いつでも一緒だから
subtitles.english: Because we're always together

subtitles.original: 守っていけるから
subtitles.english: I can protect you

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever

subtitles.original: 君とHappiness 君がいれば
subtitles.english: Happiness with you, if you're there

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だって思えるよ
subtitles.english: I feel like everything will be alright

subtitles.original: 何も言わなくたって
subtitles.english: Even without saying a word

subtitles.original: 感じてるよ the one for me
subtitles.english: I'm feeling it, the one for me

subtitles.original: 君とHappiness どんな時も
subtitles.english: Happiness with you, no matter when

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないって信じてるよ
subtitles.english: I believe I'm not alone

subtitles.original: 涙あふれたって
subtitles.english: Even if tears overflow

subtitles.original: 歩けるね please stay by my side
subtitles.english: I can walk, please stay by my side

subtitles.original: 大切なよ the one for me
subtitles.english: You're precious, the one for me

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!
